name: places/ChIJZyUgbyf2wokR5BAWisb-pbg
formattedAddress: 747 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 747 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10025, USA

editorialSummary.text: Chain retailer selling a wide array of branded spring, memory foam & adjustable mattresses.

originalText.text: Had a wonderful experience with Anthony today- the Manager of the Columbus Ave store. He was beyond helpful in showing me all of my choices and walking me through everything. He was very knowledgeable and genuine which put me at ease. Would definitely recommend this store and especially Anthony.

text.text: Had a wonderful experience with Anthony today- the Manager of the Columbus Ave store. He was beyond helpful in showing me all of my choices and walking me through everything. He was very knowledgeable and genuine which put me at ease. Would definitely recommend this store and especially Anthony.

originalText.text: We had excellent customer service while shopping at this location! Anthony was super helpful and knowledgeable, and helped us find a great mattress.

text.text: We had excellent customer service while shopping at this location! Anthony was super helpful and knowledgeable, and helped us find a great mattress.

originalText.text: Had a great experience shopping at mattress firm! The customer service was nice and helpful. And i appreciate their assistance a great deal. I found the right mattress set for me. Very thankful and highly recommend.

text.text: Had a great experience shopping at mattress firm! The customer service was nice and helpful. And i appreciate their assistance a great deal. I found the right mattress set for me. Very thankful and highly recommend.

originalText.text:
Worst worst worst experience I ever had. They're complete criminals, buy your mattress literally anywhere else.
Wasted so much energy and ended up with nothing other than a headache!!!!

A day after I placed an order, I found the same mattress for cheaper online. I also happened to receive a coupon from the company via email. I came back to the store to use the coupon and the price matching "120 NIGHT LOW GUARANTEE: – We guarantee the best brands at the best prices.*" that were expressed to me verbally and in writing on my invoice as part of my deal.
The store manager, was very aggressive and rude. He insisted that he would not give me the mattress I ordered (I was already charged for this) unless I forfeit the 120 day trial period warranty, despite the fact that I was purchasing a brand new mattress, (not a clearance) and this was part of our contract, and the company's policy. When I refused to forfeit my right to exchange or return the mattress in the future for no reason, the manager canceled my order and my deal without my consent, and the reason he give me is that he is not making as much profit on it as he would of liked.

*"120 NIGHT LOW GUARANTEE: – We guarantee the best brands at the best prices. Subject to the following terms, we will match any advertised price. If you find the same— or a comparable — mattress set advertised for less than your invoiced price within 120 days of purchase, simply bring the advertisement to a Mattress Firm store, and we will credit your account or mail a refund check for the price difference. Our 120 Night Low Price Guarantee does not apply to clearance items, floor models, vendor rollbacks/rebates, special purchases, promotional items, doorbusters or discontinued merchandise. Merchandise offered for sale on auction sites (e.g., eBay, Craigslist, etc.) or by closeout/overstock dealers (e.g., Overstock.com, The Dump, Wayfair.com, Amazon.com) is excluded from the 120 Night Low Price Guarantee."

originalText.text: Sleep Expert Sean was great to work with. An excellent communicator and problem solver, he helped me pick and order a really nice mattress that was in stock in the local warehouse and delivered within just a couple of days.
